completedMilestones.title: AI Foundation Layer
deliverables: Unified LLM Agent with Claude Opus 4.1 & Gemini 2.5 Pro
Generative AI service with 6 models (Imagen 3.0, Veo 2.0, etc.)

completedMilestones.title: Multi-Provider Integration
deliverables: Google Vertex AI integration (Imagen, Veo, Gemini)
Idempotent model registry and state management

architecturalDecisions.title: Agent vs App Separation
architecturalDecisions.decision: Maintain strict separation between internal AI tooling and production Spotify app
architecturalDecisions.rationale: Ensures security, maintainability, and prevents agent code from affecting production

architecturalDecisions.title: Idempotent Model Integration
architecturalDecisions.decision: Use capability hashing to prevent duplicate model registrations
architecturalDecisions.rationale: Avoids redundant re-implementations on agent restart

architecturalDecisions.title: Multi-Provider Strategy
architecturalDecisions.decision: Support multiple AI providers with unified interface
architecturalDecisions.rationale: Reduces vendor lock-in, enables cost optimization, improves reliability

riskMitigations.mitigation: Implemented comprehensive quota monitoring and automatic failover
Multi-provider redundancy with automatic fallback routing
Real-time cost tracking, usage alerts, and optimization recommendations
